title: The Rise of AI in India
content: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing India’s tech landscape. From chatbots in customer service to AI-driven medical diagnostics, India is rapidly adopting AI solutions.
author: Rajesh Kumar

title: Why JavaScript is Popular Among Indian Developers
content: JavaScript remains the go-to language for Indian developers, especially with the rise of startups and freelancing. Frameworks like React and Node.js dominate the ecosystem.
author: Pooja Sharma

title: How to Stay Fit in a 9-to-5 IT Job
content: Balancing health with long IT work hours is tough. Yoga, morning walks, and homemade tiffin meals are great ways for professionals to stay fit.
author: Ravi Verma

title: India’s Ambition for Space: ISRO’s Future Missions
content: After Chandrayaan and Gaganyaan, ISRO is aiming for more interplanetary missions. Will India be the next big player in space exploration?
author: AstroPriya

title: Top 5 VS Code Extensions for Indian Developers
content: Tools like Prettier, Live Server, and GitLens are widely used among Indian developers to streamline coding and debugging processes.
author: DevAnkit

title: The Future of Electric Vehicles in India
content: With TATA, Ola, and Mahindra pushing EVs, India is set for an electric revolution. But will infrastructure challenges slow down adoption?
author: AutoGyaan

title: Coding vs Programming
content: Programming means to think about the logic and coding is giving instruction to the computer to do a specific task
author: Tarandeep Singh
